name: Rudyard Partners
overview: Rudyard Partners is a next generation Family Investment Office in Concord, Massachusetts. We are a specialized venture capital firm focused on investing in early stage consumer technology opportunities for the global marketplace. Our passion is the creation, rediscovery, and deployment of many forms of technology across a ubiquitous network. Our goal is to provide our companies with capital, product development and design expertise, and unique commercial opportunities for their new discoveries.
